entry.title: "THE STORY OF YOU" JOURNAL
entry.summary:
Vendor: BLARA
Type: ACCESSORIES
Price: 50.00

“The Story of You” is a journal for parents to record their fondest memories from the pregnancy to their child's adulthood! “The Story of You” is not just a simple scrapbook for the day-to-day moments, but a book to record the most beautiful aspects of the growth of one’s child. It is also a treasured keepsake that parents can give to their children on the day when they officially become adults. 

This journal is designed for non-gender specific baby, parents, and grandparents, with multiple pages for memories, photos, and milestones from pre-birth through their 18th birthday. It is a present you can't buy with money. Telling your loved child their stories in your own handwriting, keeping memorable moments alive as the years go by.

Features:

  • Natural linen hardcover, case bound with a gold embossed title and spine
  • Unique page design: Parents can record all the moments, milestones and more that they will cherish forever
  • Size: 23cm*24cm*5.5cm (L*W*H)
  • Loose-leaf design: Change page order any way you want
  • Blank pages: Put photos of the most important moments of your child’s journey
  • Extra pages at the back for photos and storytelling. 
  • Pregnancy messages and recycling tips: Plant the sustainable seeds into your child’s heart
  • Comes with three small tins for you to keep important things such as your baby's lock of hair, tooth or anything you want
  • Set of stickers: Let you mark the important date
  • Includes coupons valued up to $900 CAD
  • Designed in Vancouver, Canada

entry.title: MATERNITY UNDERWEAR (3PCS)
entry.summary:
Vendor: BLARA
Type: WOMEN
Price: 74.99

Our women’s underwear uses soft and elastic fabrics, which is the perfect item to start her day. Our underwear is dyed with herbs. For blue underwear, it is dyed with Radix Isatidis with the effects of clearing away heat and detoxifying, anti-bacterial and anti-inflammatory. All these can alleviate female gynecological problems; For pink underwear, it is dyed with Rubia Cordifolia, which has the effect of promoting blood circulation and clearing menstruation. Our women’s underwear does not only sell in individual packs but also in two-pack and three-pack with different colour combinations.

  • Style# BLRUW180100602A
  • Spandex Jersey (95% Organic Cotton, 5% spandex)
  • Designed in Canada
  • Made in China 
Organic Cotton
  • Our products are made with you, your family and our planet in mind! The cotton used in our collections is certified organic by GOTS, which guarantees that our fabrics must be produced without the use of pesticides, synthetic fertilizers, and genetically engineered seeds.
